issue.title: [C++][Dataset] ParquetScanTask eagerly load file
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6969](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6969). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The file content should only be read when invoking ParquetScanTask::Scan, not on construction. This blocks reading in a true streaming fashion with memory constraints.
